common.cms

Class PlayCmsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.cms.PlayCmsService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CmsService

    @Singleton
public final class PlayCmsService
extends java.lang.Object
implements CmsService
    Service that provides content data from Messages files as handled by Play. In order to share a common interface with other CMS, a normal message key has been split into Page Key (required by getPage(Locale, String)) and Message Key (required by PlayCmsPage.get(String, Object...)). A possible example: "home.title" is split into "home" as Page Key and "title" as Message Key. Nonetheless, you can always skip the Page Key and provide only a Message Key "home.title".
